version_description:
Version 4.1 is now available! Please update to enjoy the latest features.

New Feature:
- Icon Price Notification (Beta) - keep track of live commodity prices right on the app icon on your device home screen! Visit our tutorial for more information and setup instructions.

General Improvements:
- Optimized for iOS 13
- Minor bug fixes
- Enhanced performance

Thank you for using Gold Live!
This update includes general performance and stability improvements. Thank you for using Gold Live!
This update includes general performance and stability improvements. Thank you for using Gold Live!
Full dark mode support is now available. This update also includes general performance and stability improvements. Thank you for using Gold Live!

Minor iOS 14 compatibility issues are fixed.
User Experience improvement: Main screen default layout selection (1 vs 2) is now "sticky", and is retained after restarting app or restarting device.

Minor iOS 14 compatibility issues are fixed.
User Experience improvement: Main screen default layout selection (1 vs 2) is now "sticky", and is retained after restarting app or restarting device.

This version includes the following updates:

- Our new widget (optimized for iOS 14) provides even more utility throughout your day. Track the price of gold, silver, and get the latest news right on your home screen. The widget is now available in multiple sizes - small, medium and large.
- General performance and stability improvements.

Stay tuned for more new features and customization options in our next release.

Thank you for using Gold Live!
